channel.title: 718 matrix source and client error
channel.description: Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx4096m Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096m The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size. Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: 718 matrix source and client error
item.dc:creator: @Limnic Limnic
item.description:
@Limnic wrote:

You do not have enough RAM to suit what you are wanting to allocate with your JVM’s. -Xmx4096m means you want to give the JVM 4GB of ram. This is WAY too much for an RSPS server or client. 512mb for the client is double of what it needs. I would go for 512mb for the server too. You’ll have room to spare.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 matrix source and client error
item.dc:creator: @webwebwebby webwebwebby
item.description:
@webwebwebby wrote:

Is it a server error OR client error?
What are you using to run it(if anything)?
Have you sent parameters through the main statement if they are needed?

Read full topic
